1.title: Native Medicine

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: For over three decades, Mick Dodge has lived wild and free in the Hoh Rainforest, and he's got the battle scars to prove it. But with aches and pains beginning to slow him down, Mick will need to do something to get him back in fighting form. He has long admired ancient Native American culture and now he seeks the help from a Makah medicine woman to get a special healing balm few know how to make.

2.title: Super Moon

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: In the Hoh Rainforest, a full moon is on the rise - and this one won't be like most. Nicknamed the super moon, its orbit will bring it closer to Earth than usual...presenting a slew of opportunities for Mick Dodge. Traveling through the night, Mick aims to reach a secret cove by sunrise, where extreme high tides brought on by the super moon could deliver a seafood harvest.

3.title: Stairway to Heaven

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: With Mick's oldest friend's 65th birthday just a week away, Mick rallies the troops in hopes of bringing Karl's vision of 100 ft. log ladder to life. This "Staircase to the Sky"will give him an unobstructed view of Mt. Olympus right out his front door.

4.title: Independence Day

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: July 4th invites the kind of reckless behavior that threatens Mick's home, forcing him to stand guard, keep watch and protect the Hoh Rainforest. As Mick begins his 24-hour vigilance, he runs into a group of campers trashing the forest. Not one to look the other way, Mick prepares for a confrontation... But this encounter is just the beginning. When the sun sets, darkness brings a new danger, as the dry forest comes under fire from all angles.

5.title: A Dollar Short

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Mick Dodge is wrapping up a morning visit with his old friend Doc Gair and it's time for Doc to hit the road. Unfortunately Doc's trusty truck, which serves as both his home and office, won't seem to start. Luckily, Mick's the perfect person to help.

6.title: Manhunt

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: In the Hoh Rainforest, Mick is part of an underground community of pioneers, and when a friend is in need of help, Mick's ready to answer the call. So when the girlfriend of Mick's long-time student, Will of Stone, tracks him down seeking help in finding Will for a serious problem, Mick doesn't hesitate to lend a hand. Will of Stone has been on a rite of passage in the forest for 2 weeks already, so this manhunt will prove no easy feat.

7.title: Forest Wine

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: In the Hoh Rainforest, berry season is beginning...and that means one thing for Mick Dodge - an opportunity to brew up Dodge Family Forest Wine. Based on a secret recipe created by Mick's great grandfather, it's a special concoction his family has produced for generations. As soon as Mick sees the very first berries on the vine, he springs into action, gathering ingredients spread all over the forest.

8.title: To Catch a Thief

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Since Mick Dodge left the modern world behind, he's stashed his belongings all over the Washington wilderness. Now, Mick is relocating hidden stashes to a central forest base camp in preparation for winter. However, things don't go according to plan when Mick discovers some of his stashes have gone missing. Confident it's no coincidence, Mick will stop at nothing to find the culprit responsible.

9.title: Forest Feast

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: Every year, Mick marks the changing season with a gathering known as the Autumn Harvest. Bringing his fellow forest dwellers together for a feast, Mick takes this opportunity to celebrate brotherhood and the abundance the forest provides. But first, Mick and his friends must utilize their primal skills and resources, in hopes of hunting and gathering enough food from the Hoh for this season's main event.

10.title: Down in the Mouth

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: Over the course of his decades spent in the wild, Mick Dodge has discovered unusual remedies in the least likely of places- the kind of tricks that can heal him and alleviate pain in times of need. But when none of his natural methods are able to diminish the crippling pain of a toothache for long, Mick decides it's time for drastic measures and seeks help from a source he hasn't tapped into in decades.

11.title: The Great Games

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: Following in the tradition of early tribal games and the Greek Olympiad, Mick and his friends of the forest compete in their annual Olympic Mountain Games. With each member carefully selected for their specialized skills, the teams undertake three separate challenges that will push them to their limits, testing their strength, agility and teamwork. Going head-to-head, one team will fight their way to the top and reign as this year's champion.

12.title: Road Trip

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot: Mick Dodge has called the Hoh rainforest home for the last three decades, and he rarely ventures far from the wild. But he plans to leave it all behind to attend the wedding of girl he's long considered to be like a daughter. Mick has very few relatives left, so when he heard Shay was getting married, he knew he couldn't miss it for the world. But attending the wedding means a nearly 1,000 mile journey to Northern California.

1.title: Meet the Legend

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Mick sojourns to the Highlands to spread his father's ashes.

2.title: Trading Up

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Mick uses a bow and arrow from his grandfather.

3.title: Hunger Pains

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot:

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot:

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

7.title: Passing the Torch

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Mick teaches a friend how to live in the woods.

8.title: Pacific Pilgrimage

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Mick Dodge prepares for an epic birthday.

9.title: Midnight Ambush

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: Mick teams up with a former Army ranger to block poachers from removing trees in a protected part of the forest.

10.title: Out of the Wild

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: Mick Dodge takes on a new student, Dave, who wants to see the forest through Mick's eyes and to reboot, refresh and reconnect with his primal instincts. Mick's lessons don't involve any text books or maps. For Dave, it's time to sink or swim.

11.title: The Harvest

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: Mick seeks a valuable mushroom before its short harvesting season ends.

12.title: Winter Is Coming

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot: Mick gets help moving his supplies across the Hoh River in order to set up his winter retreat.

1.title: The Legend Returns

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: After a long cold winter, Mick Dodge is raring to go. After discovering a map tucked away in his grandfather's journal, Mick sets out on a treasure hunt with hopes of unearthing Will Dodge's old stashes and one very special relic.

2.title: Call to Arms

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Mick Dodge hears from an old Hoh rainforest friend that hunters are illegally trespassing on his property. While appreciating the ancient art of hunting he can't tolerate outlaws, and together they sabotage the culprits.

3.title: Man Down

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: With each changing season in the Hoh Rainforest comes new opportunity. Mick sets out for his favorite springtime ritual, an annual journey to a hidden maple grove to harvest sap straight from the tree.

4.title: Naked and Unafraid

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: When a routine river crossing goes wrong Mick loses all of his gear--including his clothes. Though he often dons his birthday suit just for fun, frigid temperatures send him on a mission to replace his lost leathers.

5.title: Food Run

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Mick Dodge keeps many stashes in the forest including a "pantry" stocked with food, but suddenly discovers his coffers are running low. He must visit the "forest supermarket" to restock.

6.title: School of the Wild

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Mick Dodge takes on a new student, Dave, who wants to see the forest through Mick's eyes and to reboot, refresh and reconnect with his primal instincts. Mick's lessons don't involve any text books or maps. For Dave, it's time to sink or swim.

7.title: Mission to Main Street

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Though Mick lives primarily in the wild, he's craving some creature comforts. To satisfy them, he ventures into town and hopes to get in and out undetected. But due to an unexpected detour, Mick may have to go without the creature comforts he's after.

8.title: Storm Surge

episode of.title: The Legend of Mick Dodge (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: A huge storm is approaching the hoe and Mick takes NO shelter in the most crazy place.

plot: Follow Mick Dodge in his daily routines living off the grid.::lincolndlebleu
